title: Power fault affecting Bukit Panjang LRT services

title_translations.zh-Hans: 宝龄蓝线轻轨服务受电力故障影响
title_translations.ms: Gangguan kuasa menjejaskan perkhidmatan LRT Bukit Panjang
title_translations.ta:
புக் 
பங்கா LRT சேவைகளை பாதிக்கும் மின் தடங்கல்

updates.text: [BPLRT]   CLEARED: Train services on the BPLRT are running normally. Free bus services have ceased.
[BPLRT]   CLEARED: Train services from #Pending towards #Bangkit are now running   normally.Free bus services are still available.
[BPLRT]:   Est. 15 mins add. travelling time from #Pending to #Bangkit due to train fault. Free public and shuttle bus are still available.
[BPLRT]   CLEARED: Services have resumed on the BPLRT. Free public and shuttle bus are still available.
[BPLRT]  UPDATE: No service on the BPLRT due to Power fault. Free Public and Shuttle Bus are available.
[BPLRT]  UPDATE: Due to power fault, there is no train service on the BPLRT. Free Public and Shuttle Bus are available.
[BPLRT]   UPDATE: Free public & shuttle buses are now available at afffected stations between #Phoenix towards #BukitPanjang.
[BPLRT]:   Estimate 20 mins additional travelling time from #Phoenix to #BukitPanjang due to power fault.
